articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo went from tears to triumph as Portugal beat Slovenia in a dramatic shootout win.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Tears to triumph for Portuguese in dramatic penalty shootout win against Slovenia

articles.description: Replacing the 6,000 calories burned daily by a Tour de France rider, while negotiating the vaguaries and motorways of a 21-stage, 2,100 mile race is a formidable challenge.
articles.title: Tour de France: How professional cycling teams eat and cook on the road

articles.description: An own goal was enough to send France into the Euro 2024 quarter-finals at Belgium's expense but their scoring struggles remain a concern.
articles.title: Euro 2024: France through but scoring struggles and Kylian Mbappe mask issues continue

articles.description: Andy Murray will make a final decision on Tuesday whether he is fit enough to play in the Wimbledon singles later that day.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Andy Murray to make decision on Tuesday about playing after injury

articles.description: With many of the current squad passing through his club, Gheorghe Hagi's influence on Romania remains strong.
articles.title: Euro 2024: How Romania legend Gheorghe Hagi still inspires national team

articles.description: Emma Raducanu makes a winning return to Wimbledon, but fellow Britons Heather Watson, Charles Broom and Arthur Fery lose on day one.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Emma Raducanu wins, but Heather Watson among British defeats

articles.description: Gareth Southgate says England know they "should be better than they have been" at Euro 2024 but their late last-16 win over Slovakia has given them belief.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Gareth Southgate knows England 'should be better'

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz opens his title defence at Wimbledon with a hard-fought victory over Estonian qualifier Mark Lajal.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Carlos Alcaraz opens Wimbledon defence with win over Mark Lajal

articles.description: Biniam Girmay makes history as the first black African winner of a Tour de France stage with Mark Cavendish held up by a late crash on the run into Turin.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024 results: Biniam Girmay becomes first black African to win Tour stage
